Actor and filmmaker John Krasinski has received various awards and nominations, including nominations for five Emmy Awards and two Producers Guild of America Awards as a producer for the sitcom The Office and the reality competition series Lip Sync Battle. He also received a Writers Guild of America Award nomination as a co-writer of the post-apocalyptic horror film A Quiet Place (2018).
